languageKey.label: This field is used to define the template name, it will be visible in template list, inside the backend field template. It's very important to use a unique name for template.
In this field you can choose what groups can access this template. If you leave empty, all backend groups can access this template.
In this field you can insert a description to explain how does template work. This text is visible in template list of XFlexTemplate module, not in the template page item.

In this field you can insert the typoscript to use in your template.
Each template Element can be setted in this field, you can define back-end localized label for each fields too.
Example: Suppose you have just created an element named title and you want define the english label block title and italian translation as Titolo del template you have to write:
language.title.beLabel.en = block title
language.title.beLabel.it = Titolo del template

This field contains code of field in TCE Forms. This field have to be alphanumeric, without space and it mustn't a name of tt_content table.

This select contains the config type data of the TCE Form field.
If you change this value also the fields below change.

input: this is the standard input field
Text: this is the standard textarea field, you can use RTE leaving empty the defaultExtras. If you write anything in the defaultExtras field, RTE will not be shown.

This field defines the field in which these one will be shown. Palettes is the secondary fields and these type of fields are visible is you checked show secondary options (for a better understanding of palettes see API Core documentations of TYPO3).

Render Type is the default method to show this element. Each field will be rendered by tslib_content method, so this field will be rendered with IMAGE or TEXT or MULTIMEDIA (the render type you have choosen) unless you have changed the type by typoscript template form.
Maximum number of characters the user will be able to insert into the field.
The size attribute of the input element (the length of input box in characters).
Default value for the input box, if it's empty the value will be this.
Separated comma values of allowed words to be inserted in this input box.

Configuration of field evaluation.
The eval-functions will be executed in the list-order.
The possible values are:
required, trim, date, datetime, time, timesec, year, int, upper, lower, alpha, num, alphanum, alphanum_x, nospace, md5, is_in, password, double2, unique, uniqueInPid.
For a specific description of each value and how does it work, you can see TYPO3 Core API.
